tags.name: lrndesign-avatar
tags.description:
`lrndesign-avatar`
Visualize a user account either with an image, icon, initials, or as abstract art.

### Styling
Custom property | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
`--lrndesign-avatar-width` | Size (width and height) of the avatar image | 40px

Attributes:

  * `icon` {`string`} - optional simple-icon

  * `invert` {`boolean`} - invert colors

  * `src` {`string`} - link to an image, optional

  * `color` {`string`} - "Deprecated": Color class work to apply

  * `allow-grey` {`boolean`} - allow grey instead of accent color, default selects a color

  * `two-chars` {`boolean`} - Mode for presenting 1st two letters

  * `jdenticon` {`boolean`} - Form abstract art from hash of label

  * `label` {`string`} - text to use for avatar

  * `accent-color` {`string`} - a selected accent-"color": grey, red, pink, purple, etc.

  * `dark` {`boolean`} - make the default theme dark?

Properties:

  * `icon` {`string`} - optional simple-icon

  * `invert` {`boolean`} - invert colors

  * `src` {`string`} - link to an image, optional

  * `color` {`string`} - "Deprecated": Color class work to apply

  * `allowGrey` {`boolean`} - allow grey instead of accent color, default selects a color

  * `twoChars` {`boolean`} - Mode for presenting 1st two letters

  * `jdenticon` {`boolean`} - Form abstract art from hash of label

  * `label` {`string`} - text to use for avatar

  * `accentColor` {`string`} - a selected accent-"color": grey, red, pink, purple, etc.

  * `dark` {`boolean`} - make the default theme dark?

  * `colors` -
